items.longDescription:
Cats are Purrfect!

A T-shirt collection featuring graphics showing abundant love for cats drawn by artists who love cats. “Purrfect” is a coined word that combines Purr, meaning the purring sound of cats in English, and Perfect. “Cats are Purrfect” is a cat joke, meaning “Cats are the best!”

Tiffany Cooper

Tiffany Cooper is an author and illustrator and a true Parisian. She first got known by her blog The Best of Possible Worlds, which she created in 2012 to have fun at the same time as she was looking for a job. A publisher noticed her blog and published her first book. Since then, she has published four other books and has collaborated with concept store Colette, Karl Lagerfeld, Evian, Elle Girl, Kiehl's, VANS and many other brands.
items.name: WOMEN Cats Are Purrfect UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: A UT collection full of love for cats drawn by an unmatched cat-loving artist!

items.longDescription:
Disney Mickey Mouse & Minnie Mouse art by Yuni Yoshida

Art director Yuni Yoshida brings her unique sensibility to the world-famous Disney icons, Mickey Mouse and Minnie Mouse. This is a special collection where you can enjoy the fusion of cute and adorable Disney characters and innovative ideas.

Yuni Yoshida

Joined Onuki Design after graduating from Joshibi University of Art and Design. Became independent in 2007 after working with Uchu Country. Yoshida is active in a wide variety of fields, including advertising, CD jackets, images and videos, binding, and more. Main works include campaign visual for Laforet Harajuku, CD artwork for Chara, Kaela Kimura, and Gen Hoshino, as well as art direction for "THE BEE" and "In the Forest, Under Cherries in Full Bloom" theater productions by Hideki Noda and the Naomi Watanabe Exhibition. Received the 2016 Tokyo ADC Award.

©Disney
items.name: WOMEN Disney Art By Yuni UT(Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Unique silhouettes of Mickey Mouse and Minnie Mouse! An artistic collection that shines with the sensitivity of Yuni Yoshida.

FUTURALABORATORIES

FUTURALABORATORIES is a design company and lifestyle brand created by the artist FUTURA2000 in 1997, as a spinoff group to the parent company at that time; PROJECTDRAGON. FUTURALABORATORIES has always worked closely with UMBRELLA FILMS for visual amplification and TARANTULA DESIGNS as a graphic think tank. The brand has created many collections over multiple decades and found numerous partners in various collaborative efforts. FUTURALABORATORIES was rebooted in 2019 with excitement and engagement across multiple platforms.

items.longDescription:
Alice in Wonderland

Alice is an extremely brave young girl with lots of imagination and is often seen daydreaming. She’s not afraid to venture far out into new places or the unknown and she will become determined to investigate anything curious that makes her wonder. Follow along with her adventures in Wonderland.

AUTO MOAI

An artist who works with the theme of “anonymity,” based in Japan. AUTO MOAI uses faceless figures to express the invisible, tacit connections between people on the street.

©Disney

items.longDescription:
UTGP2020 + MoMA

The UT GRAND PRIX (UTGP) is a design competition that started in 2005 that uses the T-shirt as a creative medium and invites everyone to freely express creativity. For the 15th UTGP, UNIQLO worked with MoMA (The Museum of Modern Art) in New York City and invited prominent artists, with work in MoMA’s collection, to be contest judges: Lawrence Weiner, Paula Scher and Sarah Morris. Participants designed T-shirts based on the theme “DRAW YOUR WORLD.”

Sarah Morris

Sarah Morris is known for her complex abstractions both in film and painting and is one of the most intriguing artists of her generation. Morris’s paintings explore the codes and power structures of architecture and cultural symbols. Color and form are central to the work and remain resolutely social. Strategies of communication remain at the heart of Morris’s work. She is interested in ‘the most simplified, coded way to have a conversation with the viewer.’

© Sarah Morris
Project: 2020 by The Museum of Modern Art
items.name: WOMEN UTgp UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: UTGP is a design competition that uses the T-shirt as a creative medium and invites everyone to freely express creativity.

items.longDescription:
DISNEY LOVE MINNIE MOUSE COLLECTION by AMBUSH

UNIQLO proudly presents the exclusive collection featuring Minnie Mouse in collaboration with AMBUSH designer YOON. Enjoy the synergy between the fashion icon Minnie Mouse and the products inspired by an ath-leisure lifestyle.

YOON

YOON founded AMBUSH along with VERBAL in 2008 as an experimental line of jewelry – innovative pop art inspired designs capturing a distinct Tokyo aesthetic. The brand made its Paris debut in 2015 with YOON and VERBAL being listed as two of Business of Fashion’ s Top 500 people influencing the global fashion industry for 4 consecutive years since 2015. In 2018, Kim Jones named YOON as Jewelry Director for Dior Men, with the first creations for the house debuting with the S/S 2019 collection in Paris.

©Disney
items.name: WOMEN Minnie Ambush UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)

FUTURALABORATORIES has always worked closely with UMBRELLA FILMS for visual amplification and TARANTULA DESIGNS as a graphic think tank. items.shortDescription: Stay-fresh leggings with built-in UV protection. Adds a style accent in layered looks.UPF40

items.longDescription:
- Used compression denim that was jointly developed with Kaihara, the world's leading denim manufacturer.
- Used stretch thread for the wefts, giving them better kickback and compression when worn.
- Good kickback so they are not too tight, and have straighter lines to make your legs look beautiful.
- Used special material that tightens around your stomach with just the right amount for the front pockets.
- Ankle-length, high rise, and skinny straight silhouette make your legs look sleek.
- The stitch colors are relaxed tones, so they can be paired with both casual and dressier styles.
- Legs that look even more slim, with laser processing that was achieved through repeated trial and error.
- In response to customer feedback, we made the fit slightly slimmer up to below the knees, to get lines that are not saggy.
items.name: WOMEN High Rise Skinny Ankle Jeans(Bc)
items.shortDescription: Added laser processing to this special denim. Your knees and stomach area will look sleek just by wearing these.

items.longDescription:
Roy Lichtenstein

Roy Lichtenstein was a forerunner and main figure in the pop art movement of the 1960’s. He established his vivid style by utilizing simple black outlines, bright primary colors found in ads and comics, and halftone dots used in newsprint. He is remembered fondly for depicting not only characters from comics, but also creating new works in his own style in dialogue with great historic artists like Picasso, Matisse, and Monet, among others.

© 2020 Estate of Roy Lichtenstein. All rights reserved.
Roy Lichtenstein™
items.name: WOMEN Roy Lichtenstein UT(Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)

items.name: WOMEN Roy Lichtenstein UT(Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription:
Roy Lichtenstein

Roy Lichtenstein was a forerunner and main figure in the pop art movement of the 1960’s. He established his vivid style by utilizing simple black outlines, bright primary colors found in ads and comics, and halftone dots used in newsprint. He is remembered fondly for depicting not only characters from comics, but also creating new works in his own style in dialogue with great historic artists like Picasso, Matisse, and Monet, among others.

© 2020 Estate of Roy Lichtenstein. All rights reserved.
Roy Lichtenstein™

- This tastefully wide silhouette looks beautiful and doesn’t reveal the shape of your legs.

items.name: WOMEN Crepe Jersey Wide Pants
items.shortDescription: Cool and comfortable. In an on-trend, voluminous silhouette.

items.longDescription:
- Linen viscose material that’s lightweight and has an elegant drape.
- Relaxed silhouette that looks trendy.
- Wear it on its own, accentuate the waist with the string accessory, or throw it on as an outer layer.
items.name: WOMEN Linen Blended Long Sleeve Shirt Dress
items.shortDescription: A convenient item that makes the most out of the smooth material, and can be arranged in different styles.

items.longDescription:
- Used compression denim that was jointly developed with Kaihara, the world's leading denim manufacturer.
- Used stretch thread for the wefts, giving them better kickback and compression when worn.
- Good kickback so they are not too tight, and have straighter lines to make your legs look beautiful.
- Used special material that tightens around your stomach with just the right amount for the front pockets.
- Ankle-length, high rise, and skinny straight silhouette make your legs look sleek.
- The stitch colors are relaxed tones, so they can be paired with both casual and dressier styles.
- Legs that look even more slim, with laser processing that was achieved through repeated trial and error.
- In response to customer feedback, we made the fit slightly slimmer up to below the knees, to get lines that are not saggy.
items.name: WOMEN High Rise Skinny Ankle Jeans (Beauty Compression)
items.shortDescription: Added laser processing to this special denim. Your knees and stomach area will look sleek just by wearing these.

- Relaxed pull-on skirt with an elasticated waist.

items.longDescription:

- With quick-drying DRY technology.
- Fabric stretches vertically so you can comfortably bend the knees while maintaining the stylish silhouette.

items.shortDescription: Smooth feel and incredibly easy to move in. Light and sleek cut.

items.longDescription:
- Soft 100% cotton.
- Features contoured puff sleeves created with our innovative 3D Knit technology.
- The rounded sleeves feature a higher-tension knit at the cuffs for a stylish look.
- Slightly roomy through the body for a sleek, yet comfortable fit.
- Flattering V-neck.
items.name: WOMEN 3D Cotton V Neck Puff Half Sleeve Sweater
items.shortDescription: Our 3D Knit in a beautiful silhouette with puff sleeves for an on-trend look.

items.longDescription:
- Linen viscose material with a cool feel and elegant drape.
- It’s a clean A-line silhouette.
- A slightly vertical V-neck creates an attractive neck line.
- Use the drawstring to cinch the waist or leave it as is for an A-line silhouette.
items.name: WOMEN Linen Blended A Line Sleeveless Dress
items.shortDescription: A V-neck made from a material with a smooth texture. Silhouette can be arranged with a waist tie.

items.longDescription:
- Made with ultra-stretch denim that has an expansion rate of over 55% and recovery rate of over 89%, which is the best stretch in the UNIQLO collection.
- Good kickback, so the knee area doesn't lose shape even after wearing them for a long time.
- Feels smooth against the skin, and despite being a slim and skinny silhouette, they are soft and comfortable when worn.
- Mid-rise with just the right amount of rise and depth, to match any kind of coordinate.
- We were very particular about the size, shape, and positioning of the back pockets, to make these jeans look even more flattering from behind.
- Used a curve belt at the waist, so that they fit around the hips, and are designed to prevent them from sliding down after a while.
items.name: WOMEN Extra Stretch Jeans
items.shortDescription: A design with impressive stretch and meticulous attention to detail, giving you both comfort and a beautiful silhouette.

items.longDescription:
- 100% cotton with a soft texture.
- A knit that utilizes the three-dimensional manufacturing method of 3D knit technology.
- For the puff sleeves, placed tension on the cuffs to get a voluminous shape.
- A silhouette that is loose but still looks sleek. It features a shallow V-neck that makes the décolletage look beautiful.
items.name: WOMEN 3D Cotton V Neck Puff Half Sleeve Sweater
items.shortDescription: A trendy item with a beautiful three-dimensional silhouette and puff sleeves that you can only get with 3D knit.

items.longDescription:

- With quick-drying DRY technology.

items.shortDescription: Jersey pants with a classic denim look. Casual has never been so comfortable.

items.longDescription:

- Each belt is hand-woven to highlight the thickness of high-quality leather.
- Mesh belt can be adjusted for a perfect fit.
- Simple design is great for a casual look.
- Also can be worn over a shirt or a dress.
items.name: WOMEN Mesh Skinny Belt

items.shortDescription: Compact and easy to carry around. Keep it in your bag, and it will come in handy for strong UV rays or sudden rain.
